verses.verse: <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> that ye <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G516>worthy<s%> of the <S%G2821>vocation<s%> <S%G3739>wherewith<s%> ye are <S%G2564>called<s%>, of the Lord: or, in the Lord

<S%G1161>(Now<s%> that he <S%G305>ascended<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G2076>it<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2597>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2737>lower<s%> <S%G3313>parts<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G3303>some<s%>, <S%G652>apostles<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> some, <S%G4396>prophets<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> some, <S%G2099>evangelists<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> some, <S%G4166>pastors<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1320>teachers<s%>;

<S%G4314>For<s%> the <S%G2677>perfecting<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G1248>ministry<s%>, <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G3619>edifying<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

<S%G2443>That<s%> we henceforth <S%G5600>be<s%> no <S%G3371>more<s%> <S%G3516>children<s%>, tossed to and <S%G2831>fro<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> carried about <S%G4064>with<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G417>wind<s%> of <S%G1319>doctrine<s%>, <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2940>sleight<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, and cunning <S%G1722>craftiness<s%> <S%G3834><s%>, <S%G4314>whereby<s%> they lie in <S%G3180>wait<s%> to <S%G4106>deceive<s%>;

<S%G5124>This<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3143>testify<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, that <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G3371>henceforth<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G3371>not<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3153>vanity<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%>,

<S%G3748>Who<s%> being past <S%G524>feeling<s%> have <S%G3860>given<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G3860>over<s%> unto <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2039>work<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4124>greediness<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3129>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

If so be <S%G1489>that<s%> ye have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have been <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>:

That <S%G5209>ye<s%> put <S%G659>off<s%> <S%G2596>concerning<s%> the <S%G4387>former<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G5351>corrupt<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G539>deceitful<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%>;
<S%G1161>And<s%> be <S%G365>renewed<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> that ye put <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G225>true<s%> <S%G3742>holiness<s%>. true: or, holiness of truth

<S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> putting <S%G659>away<s%> <S%G5579>lying<s%>, <S%G2980>speak<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4139>neighbour<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> one of <S%G240>another<s%>.

<S%G3383>Neither<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> to the <S%G1228>devil<s%>.

<S%G4550>Let<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4550>corrupt<s%> <S%G3056>communication<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> that <S%G1536>which<s%> is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G5532>use<s%> of <S%G3619>edifying<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> it may <S%G1325>minister<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> unto the <S%G191>hearers<s%>. to: or, to edify profitably

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3076>grieve<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1722>whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> ye are <S%G4972>sealed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G629>redemption<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> ye <S%G5543>kind<s%> one to <S%G1519>another<s%> <S%G240><s%>, <S%G2155>tenderhearted<s%>, <S%G5483>forgiving<s%> one <S%G1438>another<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>for<s%> <S%G5547>Christ's<s%> <S%G1722>sake<s%> hath <S%G5483>forgiven<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.
